dcterms:description: The SemEval-2024 Task 1 dataset is structured into Tracks A, B, and C, focusing on semantic textual relatedness across 14 languages. It includes training, development, and test sets with sentence pairs annotated with semantic relatedness scores.
dcterms:title: SemEval-2024 Task 1 Dataset

dcterms:creator: Colin Raffel

Michael Matena

Wei Li
Peter J. Liu
dcterms:description: The T5 Model Augmented Dataset is used for data augmentation in training models for semantic textual relatedness tasks, leveraging the T5 model's paraphrasing capabilities.
dcterms:title: T5 Model Augmented Dataset

dcterms:creator: Yinhan Liu

Jingfei Du

Danqi Chen
Omer Levy
Mike Lewis
Luke Zettlemoyer
Veselin Stoyanov
dcterms:description: The SICK Dataset is utilized for evaluating semantic textual similarity and relatedness, providing a benchmark for various models in natural language processing.
dcterms:title: SICK Dataset

dcterms:description: The STS Dataset is part of the SemEval-2024 Task 1, focusing on semantic textual relatedness for African and Asian languages, providing a platform for evaluating models in this domain.
dcterms:title: STS Dataset
